message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Breadth positive with momentum in PSUs (IRCON, RVNL, TORNTPOWER), telecom (IDEA, BHARTIHEXA) and select tech (KPITTECH, OFSS). Many closes near day highs suggest risk-on into Monday. Some profit-taking in shipbuilders/defense (GRSE, MAZDOCK) and select FMCG/AMCs (HDFCAMC). Current holdings mixed: HINDCOPPER showed intraday reversal but still above buy; BEL slightly soft but near support.",
  "top_signals": [
    {"symbol": "IDEA", "signal": "Momentum breakout watch", "reason": "High-volume thrust; consider buy only on breakout >9.30 with SL ~8.90; momentum target 9.80–10.10 if break sustains.", "price": 9.18},
    {"symbol": "IRCON", "signal": "Range breakout + volume", "reason": "Wide-range day from prior base; prefer buy on dip 178–180 or strength >184.6; SL ~172.5; targets 190/198.", "price": 182.6},
    {"symbol": "TORNTPOWER", "signal": "Fresh breakout setup", "reason": "Closed near day high after clearing recent resistance; trigger >1246 with SL ~1210; targets 1280/1310.", "price": 1240.0},
    {"symbol": "POLICYBZR", "signal": "Breakout with follow-through risk-on", "reason": "Strong close from consolidation; buy on retest 1735–1750 or strength >1788; SL ~1700; targets 1825/1875.", "price": 1765.0},
    {"symbol": "CDSL", "signal": "Retest of breakout zone", "reason": "Push toward 1590s; trigger >1592 with SL ~1530; targets 1635/1675.", "price": 1562.8},
    {"symbol": "KPITTECH", "signal": "Momentum continuation", "reason": "Higher highs/higher lows; trigger >1173 with SL ~1140; targets 1205/1235.", "price": 1170.5},
    {"symbol": "NYKAA", "signal": "Bullish close near high", "reason": "Accumulation-type day; trigger >265.6 with SL ~254; targets 272/279.", "price": 262.4},
    {"symbol": "OFSS", "signal": "ATH zone breakout watch", "reason": "Closing near highs; trigger >9365 with SL ~9150; targets 9550/9700.", "price": 9332.5},
    {"symbol": "ASTRAL", "signal": "Base breakout trigger", "reason": "Strong push; trigger >1425 with SL ~1390; targets 1455/1485.", "price": 1419.4},
    {"symbol": "RVNL", "signal": "PSU momentum continuation", "reason": "Bullish close near highs; trigger >356 with SL ~344; targets 365/374.", "price": 354.85}
  ],
  "emergency_trades": [],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 13830.5,
    "total_value": 25429.15,
    "holdings_count": 2,
    "holdings": [
      "HINDCOPPER: 25 units @ ₹312.00 (Now ₹332.65)",
      "BEL: 8 units @ ₹412.65 (Now ₹410.30)"
    ]
  },
  "screening_notes": [
    "Holdings risk management: HINDCOPPER showed a long upper wick (H ₹348.85 → C ₹332.65). Maintain with a stop zone ₹321–324 (below today’s structure). BEL is hovering around buy price; keep watch on ₹409–410 support; hard stop ~₹402.",
    "Monday shortlist aligned to cash: IDEA (breakout >₹9.30; size 600–1000 shares only on trigger), IRCON (buy-on-dip ₹178–180 or BO >₹184.6; size 20–35 shares), CDSL (BO >₹1592; size 2–4 shares), KPITTECH (BO >₹1173; size 6–10 shares). Use 0.8–1.0% portfolio risk per trade (~₹200–250).",
    "Strength clusters: PSU/infra (IRCON, RVNL, TORNTPOWER), telecom (IDEA, BHARTIHEXA), healthcare IT/services (OFSS, KPITTECH), consumer internet (POLICYBZR, NYKAA).",
    "Caution list: SHYAMMETL printed a bearish upper-wick reversal (H ₹965.6 → C ₹927.4); avoid fresh longs until it reclaims ₹955. GRSE closed near lows; wait for strength back above ₹2750. HDFCAMC weak (gap-and-sell); avoid until it stabilizes >₹5620.",
    "Neutral/consolidating: BHEL, DABUR, MARICO, COLPAL printed inside/indecision-type candles; wait for break in either direction.",
    "Volume standouts: IDEA extremely high volume supports breakout thesis; NYKAA and RVNL showed constructive participation; CDSL volume expansion on thrust toward resistance.",
    "If market turns risk-off Monday, prioritize capital protection: skip breakouts that do not trigger and raise cash rather than forcing entries."
  ]
}
